trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Pocatello
There were no other sightings in Pocatello on or around August 13th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1st time= June or July 2012, 2am, on a Monday nite, went to bed & looked out window & observed object over my neighbors home across the street moving sw & made left turn & disappeared out of sight, no sound, no lights. 2nd time= I work at Idaho State University & at 10:50pm on August 13, 2012 appx was watching satellite above form 2nd floor window when the same object I'd seen in before appeared from left side of window & "glided" in a straight line south & out of sight, again no sound or lights. The best explanation of how it looked was: like the USS Enterprise from tv, both times, but the rockets were lower then the sphere on top
